EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TaaS - 2014.12.03.Email - Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Join our webinar on “Testing in the Cloud with Tosca” to learn more about how an increasing amount of people are adopting ‘cloud computing’ services and whether this could potentially benefit you. Our TaaS product owner, Michael Niessl, will also be introducing our new Cloud-Based Test Management Suite, Tosca-as-a-Service (TaaS) and showing you how it works through a live demo.
Don’t miss out!
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-taas-2014-12-03.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-taas-2014-12-03.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed Dec 3, 2014 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET
Michael Niesl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
Jessica Chao Product Marketing Specialist Tricentis
